prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a shimmering star with vibrant colors.
I want a Pokemon that has a star shape and represents calmness and tranquility.
Generate an aquatic creature with a bright yellow center and sharp points protruding.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a starfish, but with a mystical aura and bright colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that glows like a star at night, with a shimmering ocean backdrop.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the sea, with a unique star-like form.
Show me a creature that combines aquatic elegance with a star shape and bright colors.
